mdRecord.dcterms:title: Stone's Map of Roanoke, Va. and suburbs
Map of Roanoke, Va. and suburbs
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Stone Printing and Manufacturing Company (Roanoke, Va.) [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 1 map : col. ; 19 x 19 cm. on sheet 22 x 28 cm.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Shows indvidual blocks, street names, and street car lines, with ward names overprinted in red. [original]
Index to "Places of interest in Roanoke Va." includes Public buildings, Prominent buildings, Hotels, Railroad stations, Churches and Schools. [original]
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Marginal tear at lower edge. Various names penciled on verso, incl. Henry M. Thomas, N.D. Maher, T.W.(?) Goodwin. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Roanoke (Va.)--Maps
Roanoke (Va.)--Administrative and political divisions--Maps
